column2: Label
Employee engagement index (B47-B51)
My work theme score (% positive, B01-B05)
Organisational objectives and purpose theme score (% positive, B06-B07)
My manager theme score (% positive, B08-B17)
My team theme score (% positive, B18-B20)
Learning and development theme score (% positive, B21-B24)
Inclusion and fair treatment theme score (% positive, B25-B28)
Resources and workload theme score (% positive, B29-B34)
Pay and benefits theme score (% positive, B35-B37)
Leadership and managing change theme score (% positive, B38-B46)
B01. I am interested in my work (% strongly agree or agree)
B02. I am sufficiently challenged by my work (% strongly agree or agree)
B03. My work gives me a sense of personal accomplishment (% strongly agree or agree)
B04. I feel involved in the decisions that affect my work (% strongly agree or agree)
B05. I have a choice in deciding how I do my work (% strongly agree or agree)
B06. I have a clear understanding of [my organisation's] objectives (% strongly agree or agree)
B07. I understand how my work contributes to [my organisation's] objectives (% strongly agree or agree)
B08. My manager motivates me to be more effective in my job (% strongly agree or agree)
B09. My manager is considerate of my life outside work (% strongly agree or agree)
B10. My manager is open to my ideas (% strongly agree or agree)
B11. My manager helps me to understand how I contribute to [my organisation's] objectives (% strongly agree or agree)
B12. Overall, I have confidence in the decisions made by my manager (% strongly agree or agree)
B13. My manager recognises when I have done my job well (% strongly agree or agree)
B14. I receive regular feedback on my performance (% strongly agree or agree)
B15. The feedback I receive helps me to improve my performance (% strongly agree or agree)
B16. I think that my performance is evaluated fairly (% strongly agree or agree)
B17. Poor performance is dealt with effectively in my team (% strongly agree or agree)
B18. The people in my team can be relied upon to help when things get difficult in my job (% strongly agree or agree)
B19. The people in my team work together to find ways to improve the service we provide (% strongly agree or agree)
B20. The people in my team are encouraged to come up with new and better ways of doing things (% strongly agree or agree)
B21. I am able to access the right learning and development opportunities when I need to (% strongly agree or agree)
B22. Learning and development activities I have completed in the past 12 months have helped to improve my performance (% strongly agree or agree)
B23. There are opportunities for me to develop my career in [my organisation] (% strongly agree or agree)
B24. Learning and development activities I have completed while working for [my organisation] are helping me to develop my career (% strongly agree or agree)
B25. I am treated fairly at work (% strongly agree or agree)
B26. I am treated with respect by the people I work with (% strongly agree or agree)
B27. I feel valued for the work I do (% strongly agree or agree)
B28. I think that [my organisation] respects individual differences (e.g. cultures, working styles, backgrounds, ideas, etc) (% strongly agree or agree)
B29. I get the information I need to do my job well (% strongly agree or agree)
B30. I have clear work objectives (% strongly agree or agree)
B31. I have the skills I need to do my job effectively (% strongly agree or agree)
B32. I have the tools I need to do my job effectively (% strongly agree or agree)
B33. I have an acceptable workload (% strongly agree or agree)
B34. I achieve a good balance between my work life and my private life (% strongly agree or agree)
B35. I feel that my pay adequately reflects my performance (% strongly agree or agree)
B36. I am satisfied with the total benefits package (% strongly agree or agree)
B37. Compared to people doing a similar job in other organisations I feel my pay is reasonable (% strongly agree or agree)
B38. [Senior managers] in [my organisation] are sufficiently visible (% strongly agree or agree)
B39. I believe the actions of [senior managers] are consistent with [my organisation's] values (% strongly agree or agree)
B40. I believe that [my organisation's] senior leaders have a clear vision for the future of [my organisation] (% strongly agree or agree)
B41. Overall, I have confidence in the decisions made by [my organisation's senior managers] (% strongly agree or agree)
B42. I feel that change is managed well in [my organisation] (% strongly agree or agree)
B43. When changes are made in [my organisation] they are usually for the better (% strongly agree or agree)
B44. [My organisation] keeps me informed about matters that affect me (% strongly agree or agree)
B45. I have the opportunity to contribute my views before decisions are made that affect me (% strongly agree or agree)
B46. I think it is safe to challenge the way things are done in [my organisation] (% strongly agree or agree)
B47. I am proud when I tell others I am part of [my organisation] (% strongly agree or agree)
B48. I would recommend [my organisation] as a great place to work (% strongly agree or agree)
B49. I feel a strong personal attachment to [my organisation] (% strongly agree or agree)
B50. [My organisation] inspires me to do the best in my job (% strongly agree or agree)
B51. [My organisation] motivates me to help it achieve its objectives (% strongly agree or agree)
B52. I believe that [senior managers] in [my organisation] will take action on the results from this survey (% strongly agree or agree)
B53. Where I work, I think effective action has been taken on the results of the last survey (% strongly agree or agree)
B54. I am trusted to carry out my job effectively (% strongly agree or agree)
B55. I believe I would be supported if I try a new idea, even if it may not work (% strongly agree or agree)
B56. In [my organisation], people are encouraged to speak up when they identify a serious policy or delivery risk (% strongly agree or agree)
B57. I feel able to challenge inappropriate behaviour in the workplace (% strongly agree or agree)
B58. My organisation is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace (% strongly agree or agree)
B59. I am aware of the Civil Service vision for 'A Brilliant Civil Service' (% strongly agree or agree)
B60. Managers in my Area/Directorate/Division actively role model the behaviours set out in the Civil Service Leadership Statement (% always or most of the time)

E03. Have you been bullied or harassed at work, in the past 12 months? (% yes)
E03. Have you been bullied or harassed at work, in the past 12 months? (% no)
E03. Have you been bullied or harassed at work, in the past 12 months? (% prefer not to say)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassment – Comments about my personal appearance (% yes to E03 selecting this option)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassmen – Sexual harassment (e.g. sexual comments or jokes, unwelcome sexual advances, touching or assault) (% yes to E03 selecting this option)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassment – Spreading gossip or making false accusations about me (% yes to E03 selecting this option)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassment – Intimidation or verbal aggression (e.g. shouting, swearing, making threats) (% yes to E03 selecting this option)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassment – Physical assault (e.g. object thrown at me, pushed, hit)  (% yes to E03 selecting this option)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassment – Humiliated in front of team or others (% yes to E03 selecting this option)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassment – Negative Micromanagement (e.g. excessive control; made to feel incompetent) (% yes to E03 selecting this option)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassment – Removal of job responsibilities, unconstructive criticism, or impossible/changing expectations (% yes to E03 selecting this option)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassment – Treated less favourably to others (% yes to E03 selecting this option)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassment – Ignored, excluded, marginalised (% yes to E03 selecting this option)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassment – Undermining or taking credit for my work (% yes to E03 selecting this option)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassment – Denied time off for personal ill health (% yes to E03 selecting this option)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassment – Denied time off for family or caring responsibilities (% yes to E03 selecting this option)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassment – Disclosure of personal/sensitive information to colleagues without my consent (% yes to E03 selecting this option)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassment – Unhelpful comments about my mental health or being off sick (% yes to E03 selecting this option)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassment – Something else not listed here (% yes to E03 selecting this option)
E03A. Nature of bullying and/or harassment – Prefer not to say (% yes to E03 selecting this option)

W01. Overall, how satisfied are you with your life nowadays? (% rating 7-10, where 10 is 'completely satisfied')
W02. Overall, to what extent do you feel the things you do in your life are worthwhile? (% rating 7-10, where 10 is 'worthwhile')
W03. Overall, how happy did you feel yesterday? (% rating 7-10, where 10 is 'completely happy')
W04. Overall, how anxious did you feel yesterday? (% rating 6-10, where 10 is 'completely anxious')
J04B. In general, how would you rate your overall mental health now? (% rating 'excellent', 'very good' or 'good')
W05. In general, how would you rate your overall physical health now? (% rating 'excellent', 'very good' or 'good')
W07. How often do you feel lonely? (% rating 'often or always')
W08. The people in my team genuinely care about my wellbeing (% rating 'strongly agree' or 'agree')
Wellbeing: Proxy Stress Index (higher score = higher stress)
Wellbeing: PERMA Index (higher score = high flourishing)
